The [`tinytable` website hosts](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/) detailed documentation, as well as 10 vignettes with hundreds of examples. The vignettes are available in HTML and PDF formats.

* [Getting started](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/)
* [Format](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/format.html)
* [Style](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/style.html)
* [Group](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/group.html)
* [Plots and images](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/plot.html)
* [Themes](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/theme.html)
* [Customization](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/custom.html)
* [Notebooks](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/notebooks.html)
* [Tips and tricks](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/tips.html)
* [Alternatives](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/alternatives.html)
* [PDF version of the vignettes](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/tinytable/vignettes/tinytable_tutorial.pdf)
